    index="latency",
    size=0,
    aggs={
        "load_time_ranks": {
            "percentile_ranks": {
                "field": "load_time",
                "values": [
                    500,
                    600
                ],
                "hdr": {
                    "number_of_significant_value_digits": 3
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
